1151311121211111112211122222222212122221.content:
Just as Twilight opens her mouth,Chrysalis shows up with some photos in her hands, three photos to be exact.


"I had a feeling you two would've stayed put," she says. "Look at these pictures from the ride! Aren't they great."


You cringe inwardly at the queen's giddiness. There must be something about amusement park rides that bring out her inner foal. "I got the three for one special at the photo booth," she says, then she points out one photo in particular. "Look at this one. I think it's just so cute how Twilight is trying to hang onto you, [your name], don't you think?"


"Sure it is," you say, not really caring. "So what are you going to force us to do next?"


"Oh, don't be like that, [your name]," she says. "I want you two to have a little fun, too, but to answer your question, I was thinking we'd go to the mirror maze."


Twilight sighs in relief. "Phew. That's a very good, slow, and safe idea," she says. The three of you make your way to the mirror maze, but due to your collectively short attention spans, you all get separated in less than two minutes. After wandering around the seemingly endless maze of reflective walls, you finally find one of your companions.


Who is it?
1151311121211111112211122222222212122221.title: Mirror, Mirror, on the Wall...

choices: ...because of hearing you, she tries to act calm.
1151311121211111112211122222222212122221.content:
While you saw Twilight at least two hallways worth of mirrors, well, it's something like that, after all, it's a maze, you see that she's walking slowly in fear, trying to avoid any mirrors for some reason. But to her, it's seriously clear why.

         For some reason, the trapped feeling of being teased by Chrysalis is hitting her hard and she's not proud of it. All she sees when looking in the reflective surface is the guilt inside of her, and it's making her nuts.

         You walk over to her and ask her, "Twi, are you alright..?"

         Her response though was...
1151311121211111112211122222222212122221.title: It is a mirror... but did it specify to what?

choices: "I think you should ask her yourself."
"Okay, fine; maybe this letter here can answer your questions..."
1152.content:
"You just love testing me, don't you, Auntie Celeste?"

She giggles and tries to reply to that. "(Sigh) Well, I just did so not just a minute ago, didn't I?"

"Unlike Twilight, I don't really go into things just like that (snap). I like the answers in order for me to think o what to do afterward."

"Well, of course, you're the exact opposite of her, for studying anyway. You plan for the now, you don't bother to look for other resources, and I can tell you didn't even attempt to try and take Twilight for a night out."

You blushed when she said that. 'Can we just get this over with?' you thought. "Auntie, just please tell me, and I'm considering it a wonder you're not exactly against this. Does Twilight like me back..?"

Celestia replies with...
1152.title: You always hated these replies

choices: Twilight nuzzles up to you, and her wings wrap around you.
You try to admit your feelings to Twilight.
11521.content:
"I think that you should ask her for yourself," says Celestia.


"Really?" you ask nervously. "I don't think I'll be able to take it if she rejects me."


"[Your name], even if Twilight doesn't like you back, she's very fond of you, so the worst she can do is say no."


"Okay then," you say. "I'm gonna do it!"


"Good luck, sweetie!" she says as you leave the room.


As you walk to Twilight's room, you start to think about how to admit your feelings to her. Maybe you should just find a subtle way to bring it up in a conversation. You make it to Twilight's room and knock on the door. "Come in!" she says. You enter the room and see Twilight getting settled in.


"Oh, hey [your name]!" she says with a smile. You smile back, admiring the beautiful mare in front of you. Your attention turns to her wings. Twilight's had them for a week and a half, and they only added to her beauty. You look over to the second bed in the room and see some of Fluttershy's things.


"So I guess you're rooming with Fluttershy," you say.


"Quite the perceptive one, aren't you?" she jokingly asks.


"Ha, ha," you say.


"Anyway, isn't it amazing that Princess Celestia planned this trip for us?" she asks.


"It really is," you say. "Just when I was thinking that this was gonna be the most dull summer ever. Well, even if we have three whole weeks here, we should make the best of it."


"So, what brings you to my room?" she asks.


"What? I can't check up on you?" you ask teasingly. "Since Shining Armor isn't around, I'm the best you've got."


"You're only older than me by a month," she says. "Besides, I'm seventeen, and I'm a princess now. I can take care of myself, now."


"Getting high and mighty already, are we?" you ask, taking a seat next to Twilight on her bed.


"Oh, stop!" she says.


This is going well. Does this count as flirting? Maybe... You're not sure. Twilight seems to be having a good laugh, so at least this isn't awkward. You decide to ride this out and see where it goes. With a smirk, you decide to do something devious and, admittedly, rather childish. You reach for Twilight's sides and tickle her mercilessly, making the young alicorn laugh uncontrollably.


"Hahahaha! [Your name], stop! Please!" she begs.


"Aw, now why would I do that?" you say. "Well, maybe if you beg me a little more."


"Okay, okay, I'm begging you, please stop!" she says through fits of laughter.


"Alright, you've persuaded me," you say, and you stop tickling her. Exhausted, Twilight's body falls to the side, resting on you. You blush at how close she now is to you. It was at this moment when...
11521.title: Be A Man, Dammit!

choices: ... you finally have your first kiss with Twilight.
... Fluttershy comes in and awkwardly interrupts the scene...
115211.content:
You blush harder at what Twilight was doing and you sooner or later found yourself wrapping your arm around her.

"You know, I'm really glad that Celestia let us go here," Twilight says, looking at you. "Now I can finally hear what you've been meaning to say this whole time."

"Wait, what?" You weren't sure what she meant. You had a feeling that she might be saying something that you would've expected.

"Oh, come on! You think I don't have a fun side? I teleported over to Celestia's room to meet up with you, but I sorta stopped and eavesdropped on the conversation you were having with Celestia."

You were so embarrassed that she heard (most of) the dispute you were having.

"Needless to say, I was shocked, but I thought it was rather cute. I mean, you living with me and keeping that a secret for 3 years?"

She was staring at you with a sort of smug smirk. You could swear that your head looked like a tomato by now. With your free hand, you scratch the back of your head. "I can understand if you don't like me back, Twi. I just needed to get that out..."

She scoffs. "Are you kidding!? I've been waiting too long for you to come clean. Besides, I have a little secret of my own, and it should be obvious with the way I'm holding you..."

You see the Alicorn blush, while looking away from you. "I guess I wasn't the only one who had a hidden crush."

"I even tried to give you signs, (your name), but apparently, you're just that dull."

"Well, I, uh..." You look away just before you feel Twilight's hand pulling your chin. You do the same thing and caress her cheek. With the both of you looking into each other's eyes in a daze, you pull in, leaning closer and closer until...
115211.title: Maybe the feeling was mutual.

choices: She's really fidgety (and I mean REALLY fidgety).
1152112.content:
"EEP!" says a high pitched voice from the doorway. You and Twilight's eyes widen in sheer shock when you hear shriek. You both swing your heads towards the doorway, and you see Fluttershy standing there, her face a deep shade of red, and her eyes darting around wildly as she tries to explain herself.


"I... I'm sorry... I was... I was just gonna... I mean... I gotta go!" she says before darting off into the hallway.


"Did that just happen?" you say.


"Disappointed, are we?" says Twilight with a flirtatious tone.


"I've never taken you for a flirt, Twily," you say.


"It's one of the many things you have yet to find out about me," she says in a sultry voice. "I'm a very mysterious mare."


"Well, Miss Mysterious," you say, "I'll see you at dinner tonight. We'll have a chance to redo that kiss."


"I'll be looking forward to that," she says, crossing her legs and winking at you seductively.


That night, when everypony is called to dinner, you sit next to Twilight. "You don't think Fluttershy will break down and tell everypony what she saw?" you ask.


"I hope not," she says.


You both look at Fluttershy and see that...
1152112.title: Crappy Timing

choices: "Uh, um, I'll be right back!" (Safe, for now)
"I JUST SAW TWILIGHT AND (YOUR NAME) KISS!!!" (Oh damn...)
11521122.content:
If it wasn't her somewhat ruffled hair, it was Fluttershy's pin pricked eyes that would give things away. While looking here and there, she timidly takes her seat, still blushing from ruining your moment. You could've sworn her pupils disappeared when she saw you and Twilight across the table.

You hear whimpering and you are starting to pray that Fluttershy doesn't seel you out.

"Are you okay, Fluttershy?" Rarity asks. She yelped when she heard that.

"Oh, it's nothing, Rarity, I'm fine," Fluttershy says, rather fast.

"Are ya sure?" Applejack asks back.

She replies again. Does Fluttershy sell you out?
11521122.title: Yep, you were screwed when she saw you

115211221.content:
"Uh, um, I'll be right back!" says Fluttershy, and she gets up and leaves the dining hall.


Celestia notices you and Twilight seeming... concerned? No, it looks more like you're worried; not about Fluttershy, but about something else. Unfortunately, Celestia can't wrap her head around why you two would be like this. She decides to find out for herself.


"Twilight," she says. "You're sharing a room with Fluttershy, correct?"


"Yes, princess," she replies, predicting what's coming.


"Do you have any idea why she's acting this way?" she asks.


"No idea at all," she answers bluntly.


"What about you, [your name]?" asks Celestia.


"I don't know either," you say.


"Are you sure?" she asks. "You were on your way to Twilight and Fluttershy's room the last time I saw you."


"Yeah, but she wasn't there," you answer. "Fuck, she's onto us!" you think. Twilight looks at you with a look that says "Relax." After a few moments of silence, Fluttershy returns to the dinner table. "I'm sorry, everypony," she says. "I was just... worried about all the animals I left back at my cottage," she says.


"Well, that makes sense," says Rarity, and everypony else nods in agreement. After dinner, you go out to the balcony and give a sigh of relief, but that feeling of relief is short lived when somepony says something.


"I know you and Twilight are hiding something," the pony says.


Who is it?
115211221.title: Safe... For Now

1152112211.content: Who does the voice belong to?
1152112211.title: Choices 1 and 2

1152112212.content: Who does the voice belong to?
1152112212.title: Choices 3 and 4

115211222.content:
Fluttershy begins to shiver even more than before, and you and Twilight can tell that she’s bound to crack at any moment. You both just decide to suck it up and prepare for the inevitable.


“Fluttershy, if there’s anything bothering you, you can tell us,” says Celestia, and the other ponies nod in agreement, except for Chrysalis, who was just waiting to hear what was bothering them are so much.


Unable to take it anymore, Fluttershy finally cracks. “I SAW TWILIGHT AND [YOUR NAME] KISS!” she says with a yell which, knowing her, isn’t much louder than a normal speaking voice.


“WHAT!?” everypony says in shock.


“Well, they were about to kiss, but then I sort of interrupted them when I walked in the room…” Fluttershy says, correcting herself.


“Well, isn’t this interesting,” says Chrysalis.


“I knew it!” says Rainbow Dash. “Rarity owes me money now!”


“Say what!?” asks Twilight.


“Rainbow Dash and I had this bet going,” Rarity explains. “I bet that you guys would get together after graduation, and Rainbow bet that you’d get together before graduation. Just one more year, and I would have won.”


“Took you guys long enough,” says Dash. “My wallet’s been dehydrated for who knows how long.”


“Frankly, it was pretty obvious that you two would end up together,” says Applejack.


“I’d have to agree,” says Cadance. “I’ve known you two since you were kids. Frankly, I would’ve been surprised if you two didn’t end up together.”


Everypony at the table has a hearty laugh, while you and Twilight give each other embarrassed looks.


After dinner, you see Twilight out on the castle balcony. “What’s up, Twi?” you say as you approach her.


“Nothing,” she says. “Just thinking about dinner. I had no idea that it was so obvious that we liked each other.”


“Well, it doesn’t really matter now,” you say. “So, you wanna try that kiss again? We can go somewhere more secluded where nopony can watch us.”


What does Twilight say?
115211222.title: Out in the Open

choices: ... they decide to leave before it's too late.
1152112222.content:
"Let them watch. I don't care," Twilight states. She grabs your shirt and pulls you towards her. "I believe you owe me a kiss."

"I believe you're right." You both wrap your arms around each other, leaned in closer and finally touched each others' lips. When Rainbow Dash heard all that, she quickly got everypony to the balcony, even the princesses came. For the next five minutes, they were all admiring and snickering to what was going on.

Once you let go, your foreheads were touching as you got lost into each others' eyes.

"I kept playing that scene through my mind so many times," Twilight says, "but I never imagined that it would be this perfect."

Even though nothing could be heard, everyone else still didn't want you and Twilight to know that they've been watching the whole thing.

So...
1152112222.title: All she needs is to be with you

choices: She timidly takes the vacant seat next to you.
She sits next to Celestia, as far away from you as possible.
12.content:
"I guess I'll sleep with Luna," you say. You saw that as the best option. Choosing Celestia would most likely lead to more ridicule, and it would be awkward to sleep in the same room with Cadance since she used to be your babysitter (not to mention that she's married), so Luna it is.


The princess of the night blushes a deep red. While she did offer for you to sleep with her in her room, she only did so to make you feel welcome. She was expecting you to choose Celestia in a heartbeat.


"V-Very well," she says.


"Alright, then." says Celestia. "I know you all haven't packed since this was a surprise, but I've made arrangements to accommodate all of you with everything you'll need. So, girls, you and Spike will follow me to the guest room, and Luna can lead [your name] to her room."


"Okay..." Luna says.


So when the girls, Spike, and Celestia went off in one direction, you and Luna went off to the other. It took a while to get there and it was a very awkward moment. The two of you just walked the whole way not saying a word. You knew that Luna had a bit of a had tome talking with others, but this is ridiculous. Then again, you're going to be sharing a room with her, so maybe she's a little nervous. This is a side of the princess that you've never seen before. You remember that one time she came to Ponyville on Nightmare Night. You were rather intimidated by her, even though she meant no harm, now the situation seems to be reversed. Could Luna have a shy side to her? Nah, that can't be.


The two of you eventually reach Luna's bedroom. The alicorn uses her magic to open the doors. Inside you see a large bed with sheets that matched Luna's coat and had her cutie mark sewn into the covers and pillowcases. To the left of the bed, you see her armoir, to the right of the bed is an empty space. You assume that Celestia might take advantage of that to put your clothes there.


"So..." Luna says, gesturing to a door on the far left. "I have my own personal bathroom over there, and if you need anything just... let me know."


"Sure..." you say. The awkwardness of the situation is just unbearable. Fortunately, you're saved by your phone ringing.


"Hello?" you answer.


"Hey, [your name]," says the pony on the other line. You recognize the voice as Twilight's. "The girls, Spike, and I are going out for lunch. You coming?"


"Sure, I'll be right there," you say. You turn your attention to Luna. "I gotta go."


"Of course," she says. "Have fun."


After having lunch with your friends, you walk around the city for several hours, then return to the castle where Celestia was hosting a big dinner.


"While it is a shame that Shining Armor can't be here due to having some business in the Crystal Empire to take care of," she says, "we should still have as much fun as we can, so eat to your heart's content, everyone!"


Everyone proceeds to do just that. Soon, Luna arrives, apologizing for being late. She locks eyes with you for a second, then she quickly looks away. You don't mind it, assiming that it's just one of her mannerisms. Where does Luna sit?
12.title: Awkward...

choices: She wanted you to do a favor.
She wanted to ask you out...
121.content:
As Luna walks over to you, you could see a slight blush on her cheeks, as if this really was way too embarrassing for her. The only thing awkward is you sharing a bed with her. Then again, with the factors of all the other ponies, it's better than Celestia, since she just shamed you, and Cadence, because she's married.

"Err, is this seat taken?" Luna asks, gestering to the seat next to you. You find it kind of cute that she's timid. Funny thing: it doesn't pass Fluttershy's.

"Not at all, Luna," you reply. She takes the seat and you realize that her blush was getting stronger. Now that everyone was served, she hardly touched her food. Heck, Luna didn't even join on the conversations the ponies were having.

After dinner though, Luna wanted to ask you something...
121.title: This is new...

choices: Stay in the short evening dress she's wearing.
Change into one of her royal gowns.
Let you draw her like one of your French girls. (wink, wink)
1211.content:
Luna remained quiet for the entire meal, which even surprised her big sister, Celestia. While she does know that Luna can be overly reserved, she was not expecting her to be this quiet. Celestia wanted the next three weeks to be enjoyable for everyone, not just you and your friends. After dinner, you made your way to Luna's bathroom to brush your teeth and get changed into your pajamas. By then, Auntie Celeste had already brought some clothes for you into the room. You make sure to take your clothes into the bathroom with you so you can change in there and not in the bedroom, where there's a chance that Luna (Celestia forbid) might walk in on you.


After you get changed and toss your clothes in the hamper, you walk back outside just as Luna walked in the room.


"Oh. Hi, Luna," you say.


"Good evening, [your name]," she says.


"You were pretty quiet earlier at dinner," you say.


"Oh, I just... wasn't in the mood to converse..." she says, looking away from you. After a brief pause, she speaks up again. "C-can I... ask a favor of you?"


"Sure. What is it?" you ask.


"Well... when you got here, I noticed that you were carrying a sketchbook," she says. "Are you... an artist."


"Pretty much," you say.


"Well, have you ever drawn somepony that modeled for you?" she asks.


"I did for Rarity once," you say, "but that was over a year ago."


"Well, could you... perhaps... draw a picture of me... and I could model for you?" she finally asks.


You can't believe your ears. Luna was offering to model for you. Maybe this was her own (albeit weird) way of trying to open up to you. Whether it was or not, the artist in you doesn't want to pass up the chance to draw one of the royal sisters!


"Sure. Why not?" you say.


Luna's face brightens up, but it was only for a split second, after that, her face was the same as it was before. "Thank you," she says. "It's an honor."


You give an embarrassed chuckle. She didn't have to be so formal. "Oh, it's no trouble," you say. "So, do you want me to draw you in the clothes you're wearing now, or do you want to change?"


What does Luna decide to do?
1211.title: Call it a Commission

choices: She really likes it, no lie, but she'd like to add someone else to this idea...
12113.content:
"Err, actually, I request a special way to be drawn," Luna replies. She walks over to a couch while you pull up a chair and stand.

"Alright then. What's the special way you wish to be drawn?"

She puts on a necklace, one way too familiar, and starts to undo her dress.

"Whoa, whoa, woah! What are you doing!?" you ask, starting to blush.

"I have reviewed your sketches, (your name), and I have to say, your recent ones were impressive." You realize it was one of your imaginative French girls. You instantaneously get embarrassed and blush harder. "So, my request, is to draw me, wearing only this necklace, exactly as those girls you have drawn."

Now finishing her sentence, her dress falls off, exposing her beautiful and breathtaking body. You had no idea that Luna was this busty and curvy. Then again, she's in those royal poofy dresses and such so you can't really tell what's underneath.

Now that she's laying down in the couch, in some familiar pose (if you don't know where this is from, where have you been?) and you have trouble trying to start drawing.

"Now for what reason are you waiting for?" Luna asks, in a slightly seductive tone and somewhat tempting.

With somehow renowned confidence, you start to finally make the lines of Luna's goddess-like body. You couldn't help but stare every now and then. You know it's somewhat wrong, being he sister of your dear Auntie Celeste, but none of you two cared.

After an hour of finalizing the shading and dimensions, you tell Luna you're finished and then write your signature and date, all in script italics.

How does she respond?
12113.title: Does this look familiar?

choices: She subconsciously wraps her arms around you.
She starts talking in her sleep.
121131.content:
Luna looks at the drawing you made of her, and her breath is taken away. You managed to draw an exact duplicate of Luna, down to the last detail. You even got her mane and tail right, despite the fact that they both constantly move of their own accord.


"Oh my, [your name]," says the princess. "I'm..."


"Impressed?" you ask, attempting to finish her sentence.


"That would be an understatement," she says. "It's like I'm looking in a mirror. It's so beautiful."


"Well, like you said, you're only looking in a mirror," you say, trying to compliment her.


Luna blushes a deep red, and smiles. "Well... i-is it okay if... I keep the drawing?" she asks.


"Sure," you say. "The drawing was for you, anyway. That's why I drew it on a separate sheet of paper."


"Oh, thank you!" she says, lunging forward and hugging you tightly. You blush harder than you ever had before, firstly because Luna's hugging you, and secondly because she was still naked.


"Um... Luna," you say. "You're still undressed."


The princess's eyes widen in sheer embarrassment, and she immediately releases you. Her face turns a deep shade of red, embarrassed at the fact that her brief joy caused her to momentarily forget that she wasn't clothed. "S-sorry about that..." she says. "I should get dressed." Luna goes over to an armoir, takes out a pale blue nightgown, and puts it on.


You get up out of the chair you were sitting in and let out a yawn. "I think I should get to bed," you say.


Luna yawns as well. "I'm feeling rather tired myself," she says. "Perhaps we should... 'turn in,' as they say."


You chuckle, and you both get into Luna's bed. "Good night," you say.


"Good night," she says back.


As you drift into slumber, Luna does something that wakes you right back up.
121131.title: She loves it entirely.

choices: She was mumbling in her sleep about you.
She kissed you due to her dream.
1211311.content:
You feel something go around you, waking you up instantly. Thinking that it's Pinkie Pie (she loves to prank you while you sleep, emphasis on you and loving to do so), you nearly panic. But your eyes quickly adjust and see that the shadow really is Luna's dark coat.

Seeing that it is her, you realize its her arms starting to cuddle around you, then putting her head on your shoulder. Luna gives a sign of content on her face as she starts to burrow onto your chest.

You felt somewhat uncomfortable but at the same time enjoying this kinda unintentional attention. You even decided to experiment and try to move a little. Luna's reaction was that she pulled you back and hugged you more tightly, sorta gasping. You thought this was rather cute; even wondering of what she's dreaming about.

Reason you didn't mind this is because you had a sorta secret crush on her. Like Celestia, Luna seemed like a mother figure to you, only not as protective. She acted more of a friend than of those of family. You let her sleep like this, you're starting to accept this, and try to fall asleep yourself. But that was only before Luna did something.
1211311.title: Does she do this very often?

choices: Luna goes through with her plan.
12113111.content:
Just as you're about to drift back into slumber, Luna does something to snap you out of it yet again.


"[Your name]," she says, although rather lazily.


"What the-" you think.


"Oh, [your name]," she continues. "If only he knew..."


"If only I knew what?" you think.


"If only he knew how I really feel about him..." she says.


"She can't mean..."


"I remember when Celestia first introduced me to him three years ago," says Luna. "There was something about him that I found... charming. I found it hard to contain my excitement when I found out Celestia had invited him and his friends here. I was so nervous to see [your name] again. He had definitely grown a lot since then. Only... I find it so hard to express myself under normal circumstances, let alone someone that I have a crush on."


Your eyes widen in shock. Luna has feelings for you. Suddenly the idea of having a crush on her seems a lot less crazy.


"I'll admit, asking him to draw me while I was... 'indecent' was taking a risk, but the favor meant so much to me. It felt so good to just hug him as a show of gratitude. How I long to be in his embrace again."


"If only she knew," you think.


"Now I can be with him for three whole weeks," the princess continues, with a determined look on her face. "I need to tell him how i feel while I still have the chance. Tomorrow... Tomorrow, when Celestia takes everyone out to the city. That's when I'll tell him." Luna's grip on you grows tighter. "I can't mess this up, lest I look like a fool in front of the person I love."


You're touched by Luna's words, although she wasn't saying them intentionally. You look forward to when she admits her feelings to you tomorrow. How does it work out?
12113111.title: Sleeptalking

choices: "I think I may know of what you wanted to ask."
121131112.content:
You let her sleep while cuddling you, since moving will just tighten her grip, and finally ready for the night.

The next morning, you were still somewhat asleep. Luna wakes up before you do and yawned, just before she realizes what she was doing. She made the inference that her subconscious mind was making her do this, even though she had no idea what she was doing last night. Nonetheless, she rested her head on you again, seeing that you didn't mind.

After breakfast, and waking up to an awkward situation, which you both somehow agreed to try not to talk about again, Celestia leads you and the ponies to the city, to where everyone went to their desired wants. And as usual, its what fits their personalities.

You however just stayed with the princesses, with nothing here that actually goes to your liking or others' standards. It was then that you were left alone with Luna since Celestia and Cadance went off someplace for a duty they need to finish with Chrysalis. Like you suspected, your old foalsitter still holds a grudge on her for almost tricking her fianceè into marrying an impostor and leave her in the rain.

"So, (your name), how are things going for you?" Luna asks.

"Eh, fine for me. I actually have no complaints whatsoever," you reply, trying to sound oblivious of her liking of you.

"Ah, well, that's great to hear."

Waiting for Luna's attempt to confess, albeit she did so last night, you wander off into space, looking down at Ponyville. It actually looks great from up here in Canterlot.

"Uh, err, (your name)?"

If it was possible, you would've perked your ears. "Yes, Luna?"

"May I ask you something?"

"Anything, princess."

She ran so many ways of how to confess through her mind, but everything seemed futile especially because she's royalty. Her being deep in thought reached to you.

"Something wrong, Luna?"

"Um, n-never mind, (your name). Just a silly question to which I just remembered the answer to." She even tries to hide it in a slightly awkward, yet somehow adorable smile.

How do you respond?
121131112.title: Couldn't confess (with intention)

choices: She confesses to you in the flower shop.
She takes you somewhere more private.
1211311121.content:
The thought of telling Luna that you knew what she wanted to say did cross your mind, but you decide not to do that. It would spoil the moment, and you're sure that Luna wanted the moment she admits her feelings to be special.

"Yes, it was quite amusing," she says trying to suppress her giggling. All of a sudden, Luna clutches her head in pain for a few seconds, she looks back at you with Nightmare Moon's eyes. "I enjoyed it, too," she says. Nightmare's hold on Luna breaks quickly as the princess takes back control of her body. "I really wish she would stop doing that. The sooner I get her separated from me, the better."


"Well, it's only a matter of time," you say. Ten minutes later, the intermission comes to a close, and everypony gets back into the theater. As the play resumes, eventually you feel somepony wrap their arm around hers. You look to your right and see that Luna was holding on to you, nuzzling up to your arm in the darkness. She looks up at you, and you see her eyes. Whose are they?
12113112122221.title: A Good Laugh

121131121222212.content:
You simply stare at the blue, cat-like orbs in front of you, unable to form words. Luna, or rather, Nightmare Moon, giggles at your stupor.


"Cat got your tongue, [your name]?" she asks, only you heard her voice in your head.


"Are you speaking to me telepathically?" you ask.


"Of course," she says in a matter-of-fact manner. "It's rude to talk during a theater performance, so I'm communicating with you via my mind."


"You mean Luna's mind."


"If you want to get technical, I suppose."


"Isn't this cheating, though? We agreed that I'd spend time with my friends during the day, Luna in the evening, and you at night."


"You are spending time with your friends. I'm just joining in. Besides, all's fair in love and war, my beloved." Nightmare then dreamily sighs. "Oh, I can't wait to be separated from Luna so that I can have my own body, then I can hold you in real life at last. It's only a matter of time."


Which means you can stand to wait until that time, Luna interrupted. "Just because you're in control of my body right now, Nightmare, doesn't mean that I'm gone. The part of my mind that belongs to me can still communicate telepathically.


"Luna, you must stop being so uptight," Nightmare retorted.


"I am not uptight!" Luna says as she breaks her other self's control of her, restoring er eyes to their normal appearance. "Now, let's continue watching the play."


After the play ended, and you and the other ponies head back to the castle, you kept thinking about Luna and Nightmare Moon's feelings for you. So far, Nightmare has been much more passionate when it cane to expressing her feelings for you, while Luna was more conservative and shy with her feelings. That shyness, however, made her that much cuter. You still wish she was more expressive with you, though. Aside from that drawing you did of her, she hasn't really done anything intimate with you.


As you get to Luna's room, you look at the time and see that it's five in the evening. Evening... That means that it's officially Luna's turn to spend time with you. When you take a seat on the bed, you feel somepony wrap their arms around you.


"Luna?" you say.


"I know that I haven't been as open with my feelings as Nightmare Moon has been with hers," she says, "but I want you to know that I love you very much." She then uses her magic to turn you around and place you on the bed face up. After that, she crawls over you, and lowers her face to yours. "I want to show you that I can be just as passionate as Nightmare."


Luna leans in closer, and her lips softly touch yours while she wraps her arms around you. Her lips feel incredibly, yet almost unnaturally, soft. Her kiss was tentative and cautious, yet forceful and passionate. Neither of you wanted to let go, but you both needed air, so Luna reluctantly removes her lips from yours. "How was that?" she asks.


"I'm at a loss for words," you answer.


Luna blushes at your compliment and quickly reverts to her shy persona. "Well, we should go see Celestia about separating Nightmare Moon from me."


"Good idea," you say.
121131121222212.title: Passion vs. Shyness

1211311212222121.content:
(Twilight, Applejack, Fluttershy, Rarity, Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie Celestia and Everypony)

You and Luna exited your Luna's room and went to find Celestia. Most likely, given the time, she was in her study taking care of some kingdom's matters. Sure, the kingdom's matters are important, but so is the business you, Luna and Nightmare had to discuss with her. After all, Celestia didn't even knew that Nightmare Moon had returned.

"So, I'm business, am I?", said Nightmare in your mind in a teasing tone.

"Oh, come on, Nightmare. Don't tease (name) so much. You know what he means.", said Luna defending you.

"Yeah, I know. But it's amusing to tease people and see their reactions. Especially of the one I love."

That last statement made blush a little.

"It's okay, Luna. I don't mind the teasing. I'm used to it, anyway."

"But, Nightmare appeared only a couple of days ago!"

"Who said I was talking about her? I had a lot of practice with Auntie Celeste."

"Ah. I see. Why am I not surprised?", she said sarcastically.

Soon after she said that, the three of you arrived at Celestia's study and you knocked on the door.

"Yes? Who is it?"

"Auntie? It's me and Luna."

*What about me?*

*We'll introduce you later. We need to handle this matter very carefully.*

*Alright.*

At that moment, you knocked again, since it was unusual that Celestia took so long to open the door, when she could use magic to open it.

"Auntie? Can we come in?"

After a few seconds, the answer came.

"Ask again in a pretty way! Tee hee!"

"Aw, come on Auntie!"

"Please, please, please?"

"What does she mean " in a pretty way"?"

*Yes, I'm curious too.*

"Aw... Alright. *cough* Auntie? It's (name), your dear nephew, can Auntie Luna and I enter the room of my favorite Auntie, pwease?"

As soon as you said that, you could hear in your mind Nightmare laughing. And you turned to see Luna trying to contain her laughter as best as she could. The odd thing was that you could swear you heard laughter inside the study as well. And it wasn't only your aunt's laughter. That mean that she wasn't alone.

*Pffff!!! Ha, ha, ha, ha, ha!!! And here I thought that I was the best teaser in Equestria! I can't believe she would ask you to say that! Ha, ha, ha!!!*

*Yeah, yeah. Get it of your system.*

"Of course you can, sweetie! You can always come and talk with your dear aunt! Please, come in the two of you."

You entered the study to find that you were right. Celestia wasn't alone. All of your friends were there as well.

"Um, why is everyone here?"

"Because we were discussing something with Celestia."

"And what were you discussing?"

"Well, we noticed that you and Luna have spent quite a bit of time together, dear."

"So, we came to speak with the princess 'bout it."

"And she told us about her request of you approaching Luna."

"However, she told us you've been spending more time together that she expected."

"Ah. Well, actually, it's very convenient that everypony is gathered here. Because we have some serious matters to discuss with all of you."

"Serious matters?! Luna, don't tell me your pregnant!!!", said Celestia.

"No!!! Of course not!!! Not now anyway...", she said blushing furiously, and so were you.

"What was that?"

"I said I'm not pregnant! What we came here to discuss involves (name), me and someone we thought was destroyed."

"Someone who we thought it was destroyed? You mean Nightmare Moon?"

"Yes."

"I see. What about her?", said Celestia, suddenly talking in a serious tone.

"Well. She's back."

"WHAT?!"

"It's true. And I'm going to prove it to you."

Luna, then closed her eyes for a moment and focused. When she opened them again, everyone, except you, of course, was shocked to see Nightmare Moon's eyes.

"Hello, everypony."

"N-nightmare Moon! But how! We destroyed you with the elements of harmony! How can you still be alive."

"Wrong. You destroyed most of her. A part on Nightmare remained inside Luna's mind."

"And from there, I could observe Luna's memories and see everything she saw."

"We defeated you once and we'll do it again!"

"Twilight wait! She's not here to cause trouble! Rather, she's here to redeem herself and to ask something to Celestia."

"Oh? And what would that be?"

Nightmare Moon then walked until she was face to face with Celestia and, to everyone's surprise, including you, she bowed to Celestia.

"Celestia, I humbly ask for your forgiveness. And I ask you that you separate my body from Luna's."

"Celestia, no!"

"She's most likely lying!"

"She's not.", you said, defending her.

"(name)! Why do you defend her?!"

"Because I have been spending time with both, Luna and Nightmare Moon. And we agreed that we would ask Auntie of she could separate their bodies. She also agreed that, until she proves to you that she deserves you trust, she would have most of her magic sealed."

"What?! But, why would she do that?"

"Because, when I watched Luna's memories, I saw the her first Nightmare Night since we were banished, were she met (name). And, by watching that and other memories and thoughts she had of him, I ended up falling in love with (name)."

"WHAT?!!", everypony's jaws fell to the ground when she said that.

"So, I decided that, if it was the only way to be close to (name), to hug him, hold his and and to kiss him. Then, having most of my magic sealed, or even all of it, then it would be worth it."

Hearing those words made you blush, but it also made you very happy to hear that she would give up on her magic just to be close to you.

"I see. Still, what did you mean when you said "Luna's thoughts about (name)"?

"I meant that she too has a crush on (name)."

"Ah. I see."

"So? What do you say, auntie?"

"I'll do it. I can see that the love you have for (name) is pure and true. So, not only will I separate you and Luna. You'll also, be allowed to have all of your magic."

Nightmare Moon was as happy as she could be! And so was Luna. As soon as Celestia said those words, once again, she surprised everyone with her actions. Nightmare run up to her and gave her a big hug.

"Thank you! Thank you!"

"*chuckle* You're welcome. However...", she said in a very serious tone.

"However?"

"I'll give you a warning."

"Y-yes? What is it?"

"If you EVER hurt anypony here, ESPECIALLY (name), Luna, or Twilight, I won't be as nice as to just banish you. Understood?"

Instead of being scared, Nightmare Moon, in Luna's body, of course. Stood up and smiled a true smile at Celestia.

"I understand. And don't worry. I would NEVER do ANYTHING to hurt anypony. Especially (name). After all, I don't wish to repeat my past mistakes."

"I'm glad to hear that.", she said, her voice returning to the usual friendly tone. "Now, please everypony leave. I have to search for the spell Come see my in the morning and well do the separation, alright?"

"Yes."

"Thank you, auntie Celeste.", you said giving her a tight hug.

"You're welcome, sweetie. Now, go."

"Alright. Good night."

"Goodnight, my dear nephew, sweet dreams."

Once everypony was out and the door was closed, everypony went to their respective rooms. Once you and Luna, who had reassumed her body, went straight to bed.

"I'm glad everything went well in the meeting."

"Yeah, me too."

"Goodnight, (name)."

"Goodnight, Luna."
1211311212222121.title: To Celestia's study...

12113112122221211.content:
That night, you drift off into your subconscious, and Nightmare Moon follows you. You find yourself in a white void again, so you sit there, waiting for Nightmare to show up, but she's nowhere to be seen.


"Hm... I figured she'd be waiting for me," you say. Little did you know that there was a blue mist lingering behind you, and before you realize it, Nightmare Moon wraps you in a hug from behind.


"Oh, [your name], this is wonderful!" she says. "In just a few hours, I'll have my own body, and I can finally embrace you in real life!"


"You'll have to get used to wearing casual clothes instead of wearing that old dress," you joke.


"That will be the least of my worries, beloved," she says, making you blush at the name she called you. She then holds you tighter and nuzzles her head into your neck, sighing contently. "Think of all the things we'll be able to do together one I'm separated from Luna," she says as she leans towards your ear and begins to whisper. "Especially the more romantic things." Her seductive giggle at the end makes you that much more nervous. "Of course, only if you're comfortable with it. I wouldn't want to force myself on you."


You decide not to remind her of the fact that Luna still likes you, too, and that you can't decide who you want to be with more. Maybe the answer will come to light once Nightmare and Luna become two whole beings. Celestia's study will be your first stop in the morning.
12113112122221211.title: Why Can't Time Go Faster?

121131121222212111.content:
Today's the day that you, Luna, and especially Nightmare Moon have been anticipating. You wake up with a loud yawn and you stretch your arms as much as you can to get all the kinks out of your body. As you rub the sleep out of your eyes, you feel the bed shuffle a bit. You take your hands out of your eyes to see what's going on, but at that moment, you feel a pair of lips softly pressing against your cheek.


"Good morning, Luna," you say with a chuckle.


The princess removes her lips from your cheek and smiles. "Good morning to you too, beloved," she says lovingly.


You chuckle again. "That's the same pet name that Moon has for me. I guess you two really are two parts of the same pony."


"Moon?" Luna said, a little confused. "Is that what you're addressing her by, now?"


"Well, Nightmare Moon is kind of a mouthful, and I don't think it'd be nice to call her Nightmare, since she's anything but, so I decided on Moon," you explain.


"I suppose it makes sense when you put it that way…" the princess says. "Regardless, I've been looking forward to today. Nightmare Moon and I will finally be two separate bodies."


"You seem to be almost as excited as she is," you say, getting out of the bed and stretching again. "I didn't think you'd like the idea of Moon being her own pony."


"Why would I not like having complete and total control over my body?" the princess asked rhetorically. "I'd rather be separated from her than have her randomly taking control of my mind. Besides, I can't help but feel happy for her. She seems to have really changed for the better, and having her own body will help her realize her potential as a genuinely good pony. I suppose you could say that I'm beginning to grow fond of her. I'm beginning to see her less as a darker side of me, and more like a more like a… less reserved side of me."


"That's a very mature way to look at it," you say.


Luna laughs and throws a pillow at you, which hits you in the chest "Don't you talk to me about being mature!" she jokes. "Do not forget that I am more than many times your age!"


"That may be, but you've spent a good chunk of your years sealed in the moon," you retort, "and you still act like a foal from time to time."


"I guess you must be what they call a 'smartass' these days," she giggles.


"I guess so," you answer. "Anyway, we should get to Celestia's study. We wouldn't want to keep her waiting." you say. "Do you think we should change?"


"I don't think so," the princess answers. "Let's get the separation done first, then we can get ready for breakfast."


So you and Luna leave the bedchambers with you wearing your pajamas and Luna wearing her nightgown. It takes about five minutes to walk to Celestia's study, thanks to the castle's great size. A price to pay for luxury, you suppose. When you finally reach the study, you knock on the door.


"I hope she doesn't ask me to use that cutesy voice again," you say under your breath, but loud enough for Luna to hear.


"Come in!" Celestia calls from behind the door.


You and Luna walk in to see the princess of the sun reading what appears to be a romance novel. She then looks up and sees the two of you, and when she does, she quickly tosses the book aside.


"I saw that," you say. "What were you reading?"


"Nothing for boys your age," she says, turning her head away from you.


You raise your eyebrow suspiciously, then you hear Luna's voice in your head. "Tia has an interest in erotic fiction novels," she explains. "She has a hidden collection of them in her room."


"Ah," you think. "Oddly, that doesn't surprise me."


Luna clears her throat and says to her sister "We're ready for the separation spell, sister."


"Of course," says the elder princess. "Come to the center of the room, Luna." The sisters meet each other at said point of the room, and Celestia looks into Luna's eyes. "Now, I've read the spell's instructions, and it said that you and Nightmare Moon will feel a little weak for a few hours because of the separation, so try not to do anything too strenuous, okay."


"I understand," she answers.


Celestia nods her head and closes her eyes, instructing her sister to do the same. She then begins to chant an incantation that was in a language unfamiliar to you. An aura begins to emanate from her horn, but instead of the usual gold color, it was pure white. Suddenly, a pillar of light falls on Luna, and all you can see is her silhouette. The younger princess's shadowed figure begins to rise up from the ground, then a huge bump forms on her back. You begin to see a horn sprouting from the bump, followed by a head, then arms, then a torso with wings, followed by two slender legs. It looked as though a second pony was growing out of Luna's back! Soon, you see two separate ponies in the pillar of light, and they float back down to the ground before the light disappears.


Standing there was Luna and Nightmare Moon in two separate bodies. The two counterparts looked at each other in awe, Nightmare Moon being more surprised.


"I can't believe it…" she says softly, then she shouts. "I HAVE MY OWN BODY!!!" She then approaches Celestia and wraps her in a tight hug. "Oh, thank you, Celestia! Thank you, thank you, thank you!!!"


"You're very welcome, Nightmare Moon," she replies. "Now, we should all get downstairs for breakfast."


As the four of you walk to the dining hall, Nightmare Moon wraps her arm around yours and holds you lovingly. While it made the royal sisters uncomfortable, each for their own reasons, they decide to just let it go. You finally reach the dining hall, where everypony was already sitting. Needless to day, they were surprised to see Luna and Nightmare Moon in the same room. The breakfast was pretty silent, unil somepony decides to make conversation. Who was the brave soul?

Twilight and the other didn't knew what to answer. Eventually, after a couple of minutes of silence, someone manifested themselves.

Who was it?
1211311212222121111.title: An awkward moment + A new chance

"Two things," she says. "The first of which, is that I know you were lying about how you got your injury."


"Wha-"


"Don't try to play dumb," Chrysalis interrupts. "Changelings can sense emotions, and contrary to popular belief, dishonesty counts as an emotion."


"Why were you sensing my emotions?" you ask, offended. "Those are private!"


"It's not something I do on purpose," the queen explains. "It's a passive action. Trying to stop it is like trying to stop myself from breathing. As I was saying, the second thing I want to talk to you about is that I think your injury has something to do with Cadance. I sensed a lot of guilt, shame, and even some anger coming from here lately. I also sensed some admiration when she mentioned that she was taking you to dinner. (Luna)

Everypony went to about to do their preferred activities. Heck, even Luna, who was usually reserved and quiet, was having a blast. Rainbow was playing, admittedly harmless, pranks, Rarity was trying to find the perfect spot for inspiration to make new clothing, Applejack was trying to convince Fluttershy to go on a motorboat ride, Celestia, Luna, Twilight, Spike and Pinkie were playing in the water and you, Cadence and Chrysalis were laying next to each other in the sand, sunbathing. Still, even tough you were all having fun, Chrysalis and you couldn't help but notice that Cadence seemed a little dawn. You didn't wanted to see her like that so, after looking at Chrysalis and nodding to each other, you decided to ask.

"Cadence?"

No answer. Whatever she was thinking about, she was doing so deeply. This time, you tried shaking her.

"Hey, Cadence? Hun?"

"Uh? What? What is it, beloved?"

"I'm the one who asks that. You seem a little worried. What's wrong?"

"Yes. I'm worried as well."

"Oh. Please don't worry. It's nothing."

You two could easily tell she was lying just so that you could enjoy the day. But you weren't about to let it go. So, using your left hand, you grabbed her chin, turned her face and looked her in the eyes.

"Please, Cadence. Don't lie to us. We know there's something worrying you."

"And we want to help."

"(your name)... Chrysalis... All right. I'll tell you. It's just that, I'm a bit worried and scared."

"What for? Everything is going well, isn't it?"

"That's just it! It feels like it's going to well! I'm afraid that something bad will happen, that all of this is just a dream and I'll wake up and everything is going to be gone!"

By this time, everypony had heard her, although they hadn't heard what she said, and began to come closer, until they all were in front of you. Then they all sat down.

"I'm also afraid that HE will try to do something to sabotage our relationship, (your name)! But, the thing that I'm most afraid of, is that, like him, you somehow will go away and leave me. I can't bear to think that, because of me being an Alicorn and you a human, someday death will do us apart!!!", she said, crying a lot and hugging her legs.

You all hated to see her like that. And, right now, you hated Shining Armor more than anything or anyone, with that bitch Fleur de Lis being second. The thing you wanted the most right now was to beat the living pony hell out of him. His betrayal left Cadence in a worse state than you had thought. Everypony was heartbroken from seeing Cadence, above any pony, in this state. Especially, Celestia and Luna being her aunts, Twilight, since Cadence was her foal sitter when she was a filly and you, being her somewhat of a boyfriend and she also being your former foal sitter. You grabbed both of her shoulders, pulled her close to you and hugged her as tightly as you could without hurting her and looked at her with sad, pleading and compassionate eyes.

"Cadence. Please, stop crying. You don't need to worry about anything."

"But-"

You cut her placing a finger on her soft lips. You then pulled leaned in and kissed her like never before. Even tough everypony was there, you didn't cared. Cadence needed you. So you french kissed her with all the passion and love you had for her. After a couple of minutes you broke the kiss, the two of you blushing deeply.

"Tell me, Cadence, my love. Did that felt like a dream?"

"(name)..."

"Also, you don't to worry about HIM. None of us will let him do anything to you or to our relationship. Am I right, everypony?"

"Yes."

"Of course!"

"Y'a can bet on that!"

"If he tries something we'll teach him a lesson he'll never forget!"

"Yeah! We gotta stick together!"

Everypony else just nodded.

"Guys...But still..."

You once again silenced her with a finger on her lips.

"Cadence, trust me. I'll never leave you. I'm positive that we all can find a spell or something that will let us stay together, without fearing death. Right, auntie Celeste? Auntie Luna?"

They lowered their heads, crossed their arms and thought for a bit. When they opened their eyes again, they both looked at each other, confirming that they were thinking the same thing.

"Yes. Of course."

"We think that we might have the solution for that."

"Really?!", said Cadence, excited.

"Yes."

"Well, what is that solution?"

"We'll tell you later, once we get back to Canterlot. For now, let us enjoy the rest of this day, alright?"

"Yes. Thank you, aunties.", you both said at the same time.

"You're welcome, our beloveds nephew and nice."

After that, everypony went back to their activities. You and Chrysalis just stood there, sunbathing and providing company for the princess of love. Eventually, you all packed your stuff and went back to the Canterlot castle.

Now, reader, what is that solution that the Royal sisters were talking about?

132.content:
You take one look at Cadance and see that the poor mare had tears practically flooding from her eyes. The sight alone nearly brought you to tears as well.


The princess sniffles and leans her back against the bedroom door, slowly sinking down to the ground, and covering her face with her hands, sobbing her eyes out. You decide that it's best to just let her release her emotions, so you remain seated on the bed and say nothing. As Cadance finishes crying, she wipes her eyes and begins to speak.


"I'm guessing you heard me and Shining Armor," she says.


"I heard bits and pieces," you say, not wanting her to know you heard EVERYTHING, "but I got the gist of it."


Cadance sighs. "I can't believe him..." she says. "After all we went through, all our time together... why would he do this to me."


You get up and walk over to the princess's side and sit beside her. "Sometimes... people do messed up things to each other," you say. "I know this must be really hard for you, Cadance, but I promise you, I'm going to do everything I can to help you get through this."


Cadance looks at you, tears streaming from her eyes again, and wraps you in a tight hug.


"Thank you so much [your name]," she says. "I really need a friend right now."


"It's the least I could do," you say. "You looked out for me when I was a kid, so I'm just returning the favor."


You spent the next several hours with Cadance wrapped around you, and then Celestia calls everyone to dinner. You hope that nopony can tell that she's in pain.

"Cadance?" you ask. The surprised alicorn turns around when she hears your voice. "What are you doing here?" you ask.


"Oh, I..." she says, struggling to get her words out. "I was just thinking about what happened earlier today... between me and Shining Armor."


"I don't think it's good for you to be dwelling on that so much," you say, concerned for her well being.


"I know it isn't," she says, somewhat defensively, "but when I think about what Shining Armor did, it makes me wonder..."


"Wonder about what?" you ask.


"It makes me wonder if I'm at fault," she admits. "Was I not a good enough wife to him? Was I too busy with royal business to pay him any attention? Did I make him feel neglected? Is there something wrong with me? These types of questions keep popping up in my head, and I don't know the answer."


"Cadance," you say, walking up to her and putting your hand on her shoulder. "I promise you, nothing is wrong with you. I know you're a great mare, and I don't need proof to know that you were the perfect wife to him. It was Shining Armor that made the mistake, not you. No matter what you must have done, nothing can excuse his decision to cheat on you. He lost a really worthwhile princess."


Cadance's eyes begin to water at the compliment you just gave her. All of a sudden, she wraps you into a hug.


"You are so sweet, [your name]," she says. "I really appreciate you trying to cheer me up. Whoever your fillyfriend is, she's very lucky."


You blush at the comment. "Actually, Cadance," you say. "I don't have one."


"Really?" she asks in disbelief.


"Yeah," you answer. "I've never even had my first kiss yet." Your eyes widen when you say that. Why would you tell Cadance that you haven't had your first kiss yet? Were you hoping that she would kiss you in response? No way! Even if she was never married, she's still seven years older than you, and you're still in high school! What a stupid thing to say! You mentally kick yourself for being so dumb.

Meanwhile Cadance giggles at your statement and at the apparent embarrassment on your face. What does she say?

1322121122111.title: Curiosity

13221211221112.content:
Celestia bites her thumb in thought. "If I take the time to ask Spike or Twilight to spy on [your name] and Cadance, I'm going to lose them. I'll have to keep an eye on them on my own for now and then ask for help later."


With her mind made up, Celestia stealthily follows you and Cadance out of the movie theater. As she was watching you, she quickly slips into an alley and casts a transformation spell on herself, transforming her into a regular unicorn pony with a white coat and a pink mane and tail.


"If I were to just walk around these streets in my true form, I'll definitely attract attention to myself," she thinks. "I'll need to thank Chrysalis for sowing me how to use this spell."


Celestia walks out of the alley and continues following you and Cadance. After a while of wandering aimlessly around the city, she begins to wonder if she was worried about nothing when all of a sudden-


*Rumble Rumble*


A blush appears on Cadance's face, and she looks away from you. "Sorry about that," she says. "I guess I'm kind of hungry."


"Didn't you just have a large popcorn at the movies?" you ask.


"No, we shared a large popcorn, and you ate most of it," she says.


"Oh... right..." you say, a little embarrassed. "Well, I think there's a restaurant around here somewhere... Oh! There's one!"


Cadance looks in the direction you were pointing. Her pupils shrink to the size of pin pricks, and she starts to shiver.


"What's wrong?" you ask.


"I... I don't want to eat there..." she says.


Celestia, who was still watching you, raises an eyebrow. "That's odd," she thinks. "That restaurant is Cadance's favorite. Why would she not want to go there?"


"Why not?" you ask.


"That's... that's where Shining Armor proposed to me," she says, her voice breaking. Tears start to fall from her eyes and she covers her face with her hands, which makes you start to panic.


"Okay, okay, um...." you say as you frantically try to figure out how to cheer the princess up.”How about we just go get some ice cream? I know it's your favorite dessert."


Cadance sniffles. "Okay. That sounds good," she says, wiping her eyes. "Thanks."


"Okay, this has gone from odd to outright bizarre," thinks Celestia. "Why would Cadance get sad over remembering where Shining Armor proposed to her? This doesn't make any sense... All the more reason for me to keep a closer eye on these two."


After you and Cadance get your ice cream, she leads you to a private spot in the park for you two to eat, with Celestia following close behind. She eventually casts an invisibility spell since (besides her) you and Cadence were the only two people around.


Meanwhile the princess of love giggles in ecstasy when she takes the first lick of her ice cream.


"You seem to be enjoying yourself," you say.


"Like you said, ice cream is my favorite dessert," she says. "I know you're probably tired of hearing this by now, but thanks for helping me get through this whole 'Shining Armor cheating on me' thing."


Celestia had to cover her mouth so that you wouldn't hear her gasp.


“Shining Armor did what!?” Celestia thinks. “I can’t believe this! That explains why Cadance was acting so strange earlier by the restaurant.”


“Like I said, it’s no trouble,” you say, eating the last of your ice cream. You look at Cadance, and she giggles for some reason.


“What’s so funny?” you ask. “Are you remembering one of the jokes from the movie we saw?”


“No,” she says. “You have some ice cream on your nose.”


“Oh, really?” you ask, as you look down to see the dot of ice cream on your nose. You stick your tongue out in an attempt to reach it, but you don’t even come close.


Cadance giggles again. “Hold still. I got it,”


She leans in, puts her hand behind your neck, and licks the dot of ice cream off of your nose. “There,” she says. “All gone.”


“I don’t like the looks of this,” Celestia thinks. “Cadance is getting a little too intimate with [your name]. Should I bust them now, or wait until tonight, after dinner?”

Cadance clutches onto you tightly as Celestia towers over the both of you, the anger in her eyes as clear as day.


"Let's go, you two," she says, turning around. "We'll discuss the consequences of your actions at the castle."


All of a sudden, a wave of confidence and defiance surges through Cadance's body. You don't know where it came from, and neither does she, and the next word she says shocks both you and Celestia.


"No."


Celestia's ear twitches, and she turns around, looking straight at Cadance. "What was that?" she asks, giving the mare a chance to take back what she said.


"I... said... no." she repeats, slowly easing her grip on you and standing up, with her head hung and her mane obscuring her face. Cadance then lifts her head up quickly and looks straight at Celestia with an intense look in her eyes that rivaled the taller princess. "We aren't going anywhere!"

"I'm not going to say is again, Cadance," she says, struggling to maintain her composure. If she were to lose it, she'd run the risk of accidentally breaking the illusion spell she had cast over the three of you, and everypony around would see the confrontation going on. "You have no right to judge my actions when you don't know the whole story! Shining Armor cheated on me, Celestia! Our marriage meant nothing to him! Why should I keep my vows when he threw them away who-knows-how long ago!"


"Be that as it may, to drag [your name] into this is a selfish move on your part," the taller princess retorts.


This confuses you. First, Celestia was mad at you, and now she's talking like you're a victim. Maybe hearing about Shining Armor's affair, changed her mind about your role in all this. Then again, that's the least of your problems right now.


"I did not drag him into this!" Cadance says defensively. "He offered to help me get over the depression I was feeling, and I took it. [Your name]'s shown more loyalty and devotion to me in the past day than Shining Armor has shown throughout our entire marriage! I love him, Celestia, and I'm not gonna let you come in between us, not without a fight!"


As she says those last few words, the flame-like aura around Cadance's body dramatically increases in intensity, her intention to protect you being painfully clear. Celestia is caught off guard by this, takes a few steps back, and...

"I don't think that will be necessary, Cadance," Celestia says. "Now that I see that you will stand up, I guess I needn't worry, other than to figure out what to do about your marriage. After all, I thought you two looked cute together just now."

What does Celestia reply with?

"Nice try, Cadance," you say, without turning back. "I figured that out years ago already and you still don't drop the act."

"You still don't know me from these few years ago. I like to be outside of the group, simmer down a bit and just be grateful for everything I have in my life, you know?"

"I understand." Cadance said, now leaning on your side. "I used to be that way as well. Now I have a really good reason to be doing so."

"So do I." You share a hug with your fillyfriend, her tighter than yours. Where does she get this damn strength!? "I love you, Cadance."

"I love you, too, (your name)." With the moon being out, thanks to a request to Luna, you both passionately kiss to savor this romantic moment.

Unfortunately, all the other ponies have taken advantage of this and started taking pictures with their phones. You didn't see the flashes, neither did Cadance; basically, it was all too quiet. You separate and get back inside and for some reason, a slow song is playing.

You grab Cadance's hand and kiss it, saying afterward, "May I have this dance?"

"Oh, such a gentleman," she teases, "but okay."

You danced for at least ten minutes before everyone gave in that night. Some decided to turn it since it was getting late. Now that Cadance was your actual fillyfriend, you have no more sentiments of being uncomfortable sleeping with her.

info.brief_description: An alternate version of my original MLP interactive.
info.description:
This is an alternate telling of my original MLP interactive, High School Adventures. It's an idea that's bee floating in my head for awhile now, and I've decided to take a chance with it.

You are the main character, and your backstory is identical to the one you had in the original story. You're a human living in a world where humans and ponies coexist with one another. You're seventeen years old and your parents sent you to Ponyville to spend your high school years, so you've been living there for almost three years now. Celestia watches over you, as a favor to your parents, who she is very close friends with.

The main difference between this interactive and the original one (if you haven't already guessed it) is that instead of your love interest being one of the Mane 6, you will have the option to choose between the Princess Celestia, Princess Luna, and Princess Cadance (with the addition of Queen Chrysalis, as per suggestion by a friend of mine).

The story will begin in the summertime, with you and your friends receiving and invitation from the princesses to stay at Canterlot Castle for three weeks.

Here's a quick summary of your relationships with the princesses and the Mane 6:

Let's start with the Mane 6, Twilight is your closest friend out of the bunch, having known her since she lived in Canterlot, you live with her in Ponyville. You have a sort-of frenemy relationship with Rainbow Dash. While she is your friend, you two can get at odds with each other often. Pinkie Pie... well, she's friends with everyone, and she seems nice, just a little strange. Rarity is your second best friend since you both have artistic tastes. Applejack serves a big sister role to you, and you find Fluttershy's shyness to be rather cute. On to the Princesses.

Celestia is like a second mother to you. She insists on you calling her "Auntie Celeste," but you refrain from calling her that in front of others. You and Luna don't talk much, but she seems nice. Cadance used to foalsit you and Twilight, so you've known her longer than the other princesses. You even had a crush on her when you were little, but you've long since gotten over that.

As for Chrysalis, all you know is that she tried to sabotage Cadance's wedding.

The same rules that applied to the original story apply here as well. (Except rule 2, since I doubt it'll be needed for this version), so have fun!

NEW RULE! (Added 10/13/13): PLEASE have good spelling and grammar in your additions. Any chapters submitted after the date this rule has been added will be deleted.

Original story here: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1894017-MLP-FiM---High-School-Adven...

EDIT: After some consideration, I've decided to add Twilight as an option now that she's a princess. She will, however, remain a regular unicorn in the original interactive.

EDIT 3/29/13: After less than two months, this interactive has already reached 100 chapters!

EDIT 6/21/13: Changed the name of the story to Royalty Edition since not all of the love interests are princesses.

EDIT 6/29/13: Broke 200 chapters today!

EDIT 10/10/13: Broke 300 chapters last night!
